page.title: 15A DAY CARE GROUP 1
page.content: Mrs.S.Mitchell runs a private day care group at her home on Larkhill. She looks after young children while their parents are at work,taking them for walks or finding things for them to do in or around the house.The childrens parents drop off their child in the morning and either pick them up at lunch time,if they have a part time job or after they finish work in the evening. Mrs.Mitchell orders books and games from a wholesale supplier and so gets them cheap.The childrens parents pay part of the money towards buying the equipment Mrs.Mitchell needs to run her play group successfully.
